name: Blair v. Baltimore & Ohio Railroad Company, Appellant

parties: Blair v. Baltimore & Ohio Railroad Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Pee Cueiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the court below.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Charles J. Margiotti, with him Vincent M. Casey and Margiotti & Casey, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Blair v. Baltimore & Ohio Railroad Company, Appellant.
Argued September 27, 1945.
Before Maxey, C. J., Dbew, Linn, Stebn, Pattebson, Steaene and Jones, JJ.
Charles J. Margiotti, with him Vincent M. Casey and Margiotti & Casey, for appellant.
J. Thomas Hoffman, for appellee.
October 30, 1945:
